definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Spokeswomen for Apple and Microsoft declined to comment.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司和微軟公司的發言人拒絕置評。

sentences.english: But Apple says it intends to link Siri to more databases.
sentences.chinese: 但蘋果公司稱，準備讓Siri鏈接更多的數據庫。

sentences.english: Apple had been setting the terms of the battle, baiting Google into action.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司一直在爲戰爭設置條件，並引誘谷歌參戰。

sentences.english: Apple’s website is a great example ofthis.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司的網站是一個絕佳的例子。

sentences.english: Neither Apple nor Mr. Jobs have confirmed he had the Whipple procedure.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司和喬布斯均未證實他做過惠普爾手術。

sentences.english: Apple's customer service, which is perennially ranked highly, is illustrative of the differences.
sentences.chinese: 常年排名很高的蘋果公司顧客服務是這一差異的例證。

sentences.english: It depends on how Foxconn and Apple work with the loc's government.
sentences.chinese: 其依賴於富士康和蘋果公司如何與當地政府互助。

sentences.english: Apple has steered away from the low-margin netbook market in favor of higher-end computers.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司已經放棄低端電腦市場而轉向高端市場。

sentences.english: Apple company received the inquiry sheet which is sent by a British company.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司收到一家英國公司寄來的詢價單。

sentences.english: Sculley helped force Jobs out of Apple in 1985.
sentences.chinese: 1985年他幫助將喬布斯趕出蘋果公司。

sentences.english: Other differences between films and music may also put a damper on Apple's ambitions.
sentences.chinese: 電影與音樂的其它差別也將抑制蘋果公司的野心。

sentences.english: Apple's products are shrink-wrapped and ready to go.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司的產品已整裝待發，準備迎戰。

sentences.english: Clearly Apple knows something about facilitating online commerce.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，蘋果公司知道如何促進電商發展。

sentences.english: The company sent me the new version of the migration program and it worked.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司給我送來了新版的轉移程序，這次成功了。

sentences.english: Jobs was forced out of Apple in 1985 by a hostile board of directors.
sentences.chinese: 喬布斯於1985年因意見分岐被排擠出蘋果公司。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, these requirements all suffer the rejection of malic company.
sentences.chinese: 不過，這些要求均遭到蘋果公司的拒絕。

definition: to cut staff/to lay off employees
to inject funds/to put money into (the market)
private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
